Landing.landingh2: Send emails, posts, and messages via SMS without an internet connection. Share important information even in areas with limited or no internet access

AboutRelaySMS.Description: RelaySMS, formerly known as SMSWithoutBorders (swob) app, is a user-friendly application that empowers you to send messages across your favorite messaging platforms, even when you're disconnected from the internet. Think of it as a secure bridge that connects your offline world to online communication channels. RelaySMS utilizes SMS technology as a reliable relay, allowing you to seamlessly transmit messages even in areas with limited or no internet access.
AboutRelaySMS.Description1: The concept for SMSWithoutBorders, now RelaySMS, originated from a simple yet powerful vision: ensuring everyone has access to reliable communication, regardless of internet connectivity. Many regions around the world have limited or unreliable internet infrastructure, creating communication barriers that can be disruptive for individuals and communities. RelaySMS was born to bridge this gap, empowering users to stay connected with friends, family, and colleagues even when offline.

Howitworks.HowItWorksSubtitle: Learn how our service functions seamlessly
Howitworks.HowItWorksA: Grant RelaySMS permission to send emails, posts, or messages on your behalf securely.
Howitworks.HowItWorksB: Craft your content effortlessly. With RelaySMS, your messages are automatically dispatched using your preferred SMS app.
Howitworks.HowItWorksC: Your content swiftly reaches RelaySMS access points, ensuring it's distributed to your audience without delay.
Howitworks.HowItWorksD: Receive instant SMS notifications, keeping you informed of delivery status and ensuring peace of mind.

Map.RelaySMSMap: RelaySMS is actively used in over 60 countries.

Blog.BlogSubHeader: Stay updated with the latest news, articles, and insights from RelaySMS.

Blog.Reliability: Reliability Of Gateway Clients In Smswithoutborders
Blog.IDHeader: RelaySMS Expands User Control with Device ID Registration
Blog.IDD: RelaySMS (swob app) introduces a powerful new feature: Device ID Registration with RelaySMS Vault! This innovative approach gives you more control over your offline messaging experience.
Blog.RebrandD: SMSWithoutBorders itself is becoming the umbrella project encompassing RelaySMS and other messaging tools. The core functionality remains the same, but users can expect a new name, enhanced security features, and a focus on future growth under the SMSWithoutBorders project.

FAQ.FAQSubheader: Find answers to the most common questions.
FAQ.FAQ1: Is RelaySMS available on my device?
FAQ.faq1: RelaySMS is currently available for Android. We are working on expanding compatibility to other platforms.
FAQ.FAQ3: How do I send an offline message?
FAQ.faq3: Choose the platform you want to send the message to and compose your message within the app. Or click the Help button to find full tutorials on how to send messages through the app.
FAQ.FAQ4: Are there any limitations on offline messages?
FAQ.faq4: There are no limits on the size and number of messages you can send with the app.
FAQ.FAQ5: I'm having trouble logging in to my account. What should I do?
FAQ.faq5: Click the help button to find full tutorials on logging in to your account and if you can't find a solution, you can reach out to our support team at developers@smswithoutborders.com.
FAQ.FAQ6: I'm experiencing technical difficulties with the app. How can I get help?
FAQ.faq6: You can reach out to our support team at developers@smswithoutborders.com or on social media at https://x.com/RelaySMS or by visiting our website.
FAQ.FAQ7: How do I update the RelaySMS app?
FAQ.faq7: The app will usually prompt you to update when a new version is available. You can also manually check for updates through your device's app store.
